abilities.name: Greater Daemon of Tzeentch
abilities.rule: While a friendly **TZEENTCH LEGIONES DAEMONICA** unit is within 6" of this model, that unit is within your armyâ€™s Shadow of Chaos.

abilities.name: One Head Looks Forward
abilities.rule: At the end of your Command phase, if this model is on the battlefield, take a Leadership test for this model; if that test is passed, you gain 1CP.

abilities.name: One Head Looks Back
abilities.rule: Each time your opponent targets a unit from their army with a Stratagem, if that unit is within 12" of this model, increase the cost of that use of that Stratagem by 1CP (this is not cumulative with any other rules that would increase the CP cost of that Stratagem).
